page.title: 18Church Farm
page.content: Church farm is about 250 years old.The back part of the house is 250 years old but the front part of the house has only just been built.They have old barns that have been converted into rooms and one is being made into a play room.There is a granary from years ago.They have two fields which have no crops at all.The only animals they have are chickens.The farm is not a working farm.They have four acres of land they have stables but they use them as sheds and the front bit of the house is very bumpy.
